Review.Titre: Do not buy anything from this company.
Review.Contenu: After you buy a domain name they block your account so you can't access the domain that you PAID FOR. Then if you try to get your account unblocked, they make you jump through hoops trying to resolve an issue that you shouldn't have to deal with in the first place.
I have registered my domain with spaceship few month ago. but they banned my account without any reason. they saying that i have made duplicate account which is fake. stay away from spaceship.

Review.Titre: Tried to transfer a domain to Spaceship
Review.Contenu: Tried to transfer a domain via paypal, transaction declined 3 times, have to go with a established domain provider. Wasted a bunch of time to save a few bucks. And today paypal approved the 2 transaction out the blue for no reason whatsoever. Now i have to chase paypal my bank and spaceship to get refund. FIX YOUR BROKEN PAYMENT SYSTEM. I do not recommend spaceship at all.

They closed my account and canceled my domain name, it was a complete waste of time. Instead of buying from Godaddy, I bought a domain from spaceship because it suggested it on the tld-list. I set everything up, connected my hosting, and a few minutes later I got an email, they closed my account and canceled my domain. This was ridiculous, they just took all my time instead of just asking for a confirmation.

Becoming a Spaceship customer was a real tragedy.The client panel interface has bugs, like checking the box to not display the message again, and the same message is displayed over and over again.In addition, the site makes the experience for changing DNS servers bad.eu domain was offline for several hours, so I asked for a quick cancellation of it, to register it again in Google Domains.A community with a population of over 40 million has gone offline due to issues not resolved by Spaceship.com!

I just bought my domain few weeks ago on spaceship. They ban my domain without any warning. However i removed all the data. I am requesting them consistently to unban my domain but they are not bothering to listen me and review my appeal. If spaceship ownerreading this, then this is not a professional service.

Review.Titre: Ridiculously they just scammed me off!
Review.Contenu: Ridiculously they just scammed me off!I bought a .co domain from their website and paid for it after I tried to add nameservers to my domain they sent me 2 emails one saying my account is closed and second email saying that my domain is cancelled due to fraud! SPACESHIP.COM ASKED ME FOR MORE DETAILS AND CONVINCED ME ABOUT A REFUND BUT I DO NOT NEED REFUND NOW ANYMORE I NEED MY DOMAIN WHICH I PAID FOR!

I'm deeply frustrated and disappointed with the recent experience I had with the Spaceship registrar. On the very night I purchased my domain name, it was unexpectedly cancelled, and I received an email stating that it was due to "Abuse." However, I cannot comprehend how my domain could have violated any rules or caused harm in any way. To make matters worse, the support team has been unresponsive, providing no explanation or assistance whatsoever. This situation has left me feeling cheated as they have not only cancelled my domain without justification but also kept my money. I initially chose this registrar because they offered the cheapest .me domain prices, but I will never use their services again, nor would I recommend them to anyone. Beware of Spaceship registrar, as they appear to be engaging in dishonest practices.I highly believe they want the domain for themselves because it was a very good name which related to the "Threads", the new popular social network. They cancelled mine to get it for themselves.

Review.Titre: Great UI, best PRICE, UX need improvement
Review.Contenu: Although Spaceship is part of Namecheap, I like it better, especially the User Interface is simple and modern. The domain price is arguably the cheapest on the market (for now). Unfortunately, the UX in the client area is quite confusing (lack of structured flow). I don't need to reach support right now (so can't review it). Hopefully, Spaceship will grow and continue to prioritize its users & clients.Thank you!

Review.Titre: Spaceship is one of the best..
Review.Contenu: Spaceship got one of the best Dashboard's / Control Panel's. Simple and Stylish. And to have email hosting under the same roof is a big plus. Spacemail has the same style and simplicity as Spaceship's Dashboard. We have tried many different hosting companies and this is one we recommend the most.

The Spaceship hosting and domain platform is fast and sleek. Also its easy for me to find what I want inside the panel. I have given 4 stars because Spaceship is a recent comer to the domain and hosting business. Shall they be able to sustain? will there prices spike up after some time?

This operation seems excellent. Prices are very competitive, with cutting-edge web interface and user experience. The name Spaceship(.com) also points to a premium effort. I'm not yet a customer solely because there remains a small gap in trust. Who are these people? "About Us" would improve with a handful of real faces. I want a measure of stability -- hopefully this business will survive a few years at least; is there adequate funding & resolve? This is a tough field, with tight margins, can they survive? It is troublesome to migrate websites and email if their effort can't be sustained. Finally, I see (with a bit of research, though the extent of linkage is not clear) that Namecheap shut-down their Russian clients rather summarily. We live in volatile times. Will politics or a (foreign) government's policies disrupt my relationship with this firm? The imagery of a spaceship is borderless, but do they have any commitment to operating in a borderless manner?

Randomly disconnected my hosting and domain resulting site begin wiped. The index page no longer works either after restoring a backup, nice job.Edit: 24hrs later I got a very detailed service disruption update email, explaining what caused the outage. Appreciating the transparency, hopefully, this won't happen again.

Decent prices, nice UX and all the features you need to manage your domains. I'm migrating all my domains from Google Domains to Spaceship because it's the best company in the market right now.

The website interface was also very user-friendly and intuitive, making it easy for me to find and purchase the domains I needed.Overall, I'm very impressed with the service provided by Spaceship.com and would definitely recommend it to others looking to purchase domains. I plan on telling my friends and colleagues about my positive experience and encouraging them to give Spaceship.com a try. Thanks for the great service!

Review.Titre: Totally loved the website and the…
Review.Contenu: Totally loved the website and the prices of the domain. The user interface looks cool and great. However, I have not yet tried their hosting, only purchased domains from there. The prices of shared hosting seems nice, not sure how the service is. but for domain, Spaceship is cool. Loved the website and the idea.

Things are a bit rough around the edge as we blast off here but the fact there’s people out there even just thinking of the possibility of doing the kind of stuff Spaceship.com is doing is totally stellar! Spaceship.com is actually doing it, though! And that just out of this world!

I have over 100 domains with another registrar and their renewal rate has gone up twice just this year. I started looking for options and thought I would try spaceship.com. I had some reservations, but transferred a couple at first. I found initiating the transfer wasn't intuitive. I installed the transfer manager but no link to start a transfer. I couldn't find a help link inside launchpad so I went to the home page chat. Within a minute a nice tech was there to help me find where to start the transfer (which is from the home page). Those two transfers went well so the next day I initiated 13 more transfers, but had problem with the auth code being accepted (gave an error). I jumped on chat and again, a tech was with me in a minute and we worked it out. Everything has gone smoothly since. Now that my first batch has completed I navigated around and found the interface to be my favorite out of any registrar I have ever managed domains. I'm really liking spaceship.com and can't wait to have all my domains moved over. I highly recommend!
I registered a domain at spaceship and my experience is amazing. Such a fast domain registrar. Registered and completed my order within a blink of eye. Thankyou and keep providing such service.
BEST EXPERIENCE An easy interface. You can request a domain and connect it in seconds and at the best prices

Review.Titre: Best Domain Management Site I've Ever Used - Very Intuitive With A Nice Design And Clean Interface As Well As Nice Chill Support Staff, Couldn't Ask For More, Honestly!
Review.Contenu: Best Domain Management Site I've Ever Used, I used to be with Google Domains, now they were great.. Except they are now in an agreement with Squarespace and I can't promise myself that the price of my Domain won't go up significantly after the 1 year same domain price promise that they accepted, after going back and forth with the team over at Spaceship, I can say for certainty that I've no idea what the negative reviews are on about, if I have to give my honest opinion, don't let the bad reviews put you off at all because I've not experienced any issues ever since I made the jump to Spaceship, sure there’s a few hitches here and there but nothing that can’t be worked around and they are working on consistently adding new features and fixing bugs, for which you should check their Roadmap to see what might be coming next! Another thing I can say is that even if you haven't quite made the flight to the Spaceship yet and are worried about some things and have some questions, don't be scared to ask the support team over at Spaceship, I had a bunch of questions over a bunch of days before I transferred my domain, I asked a lot and ended up opening at least 5 tickets because I'd have a new question every 2 - 3 days, their support team always got back to me really quickly and were very nice, all of them are absolutely amazing and the hard effort is really paying off. Another thing I like about Spaceship is how open they are to the community, I never really see anyone such as Google or Microsoft365 Admin etc mention what features they are adding but Spaceship have a subpage for what's coming next ( Go to their website, scroll to the bottom, under “About Spaceship” press “Roadmap” ) and you as a consumer are able to select and vote which one you want to be implemented / worked on next and it's amazing. Honestly coming from Google Domains and moving to Spaceship has been an amazing experience. Now would I stay with them long term? Yes I would I feel like what they are doing now, they are becoming a mainstream Domain Management site and with their intuitive UX Site and always happy to help 24/7 support I can say for certainty that I won't ever move from them because simply I wouldn't get a better experience anywhere else, thank you Spaceship for existing, and thank you for your well curated customer support, you're all absolutely amazing and I simply couldn't ask for more other than keep working hard on those features and bug fixes, you’re awesome and keep on at it :)
